logo.description: Spring Meadows Golf Course logo, company branding element.
logo.usage: Displayed in the header and throughout the site for brand recognition.

coursePhoto.description: Golf course photograph showing the scenic landscape and playing area.
coursePhoto.usage: Featured prominently on the homepage to showcase the course's beauty.

webBanner586.description: Web banner image for promotional content (586px width).
webBanner586.usage: Used in responsive design for medium-sized viewports.

webBanner652.description: Web banner image for promotional content (652px width).
webBanner652.usage: Used in responsive design for larger viewports.

videoThumbnail.description: Video thumbnail/poster image for the Spring Meadows promotional video.
videoThumbnail.usage: Displayed as a video preview before the promotional video plays.

topographicMap.description: Topographic map image showing the golf course layout and terrain.
topographicMap.usage: Used to display course layout and help players understand the terrain.

promoVideo.description: Promotional video showcasing Spring Meadows Golf Course features and amenities.
promoVideo.usage: Featured on the homepage to engage visitors and showcase the course experience.

favicon.description: Website favicon icon displayed in browser tabs and bookmarks.
favicon.usage: Standard favicon for browser identification and branding.
